attributes.action: Look into the future of the English International Baccaureate
attributes.additional_details: The English International Baccaureate was supposed to be a better alternatative to the A Level.  Instead in the first year of final results and university applicants, most of the students failed to get their predicted grade  and had to look for alternative universities/ did not get in. Students have failed because of politicians experiments. It would be better if the Alevel was made harder
